article_metadata.title: Kearney communities offer $2,000 paid closing costs, free club membership | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Three Porter Communities are found in Kearney, which offers a small-town suburban setting. Those communities are Clear Creek Ridge, Villas of MariMack and The Estates of MariMack.
og.title: Kearney communities offer $2,000 paid closing costs, free club membership
